name: House of Survivors
description:
DALAC presents: House Of Survivors

This is House Of Survivors, a puzzle light horror game in which you will try to save a family from a haunted housed, being subjected to some challenges in order to save each of the members of the family.

Meet The Tanner Family: Henry Tanner: 

The head of the family and the main character of the game, Henry Tanner,  a shy and hard-working plumber that will do anything to keep his family safe.

Anna Tanner:

Anna,  a passionate cooker and an energetic and really curious woman.

Charlie Tanner:

An afficionate gamer, Charlie Tanner, an energetic and a bit problematic kid.

Ethel Tanner:

A lover of board games, Ethel, a wise and smart old woman

How To Play:

In order to play just press the "Run Game" button, and that's it, you are in the game. Then get in a decide the Tanners fate.

Meet the Team:

Producer & Programming ---> Alema.17

Art & Animation  ---> Texa_Saro & Candela_Gamboa

Design ---> Lucigu888
